start_time.description: Local start time selected by user (e.g., '2:30 PM', '14:30', '7:30 PM')

assigned_vet_user_id.description: Specific vet UUID if requested (optional - system will assign if not provided)

pet_owner_id.description: Pet owner UUID from user lookup. This corresponds to user.id from check_user response

practice_id.description: Practice UUID - use the practice_id variable exactly as provided

pet_names.description: List of pet names for this appointment (e.g., ['Amira'], ['Winston'], ['Amira', 'Winston']). Optional - all pets included if not specified
